amendment.description: To provide for the Office of the President pro tempore emeritus.

vote.text: Amendment SA 165 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 165 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S1405-1406; text: CR S1405) To provide for the Office of the President pro tempore emeritus.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 165 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 165 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Byrd.
